      public static java.util.List<ClientHandler> getConnectedClients()

      Returns:

    • getDisconnectedClientMap

      public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​ClientHandler> getDisconnectedClientMap()
      Method getDisconnectedClientMap search in the clientMap if there are any disconnected ClientHandler.
      Returns:
      the HashMap containing the disconnected ClientHandlers and the relative username.

      public static void replaceClientHandler​(java.lang.String username, ClientHandler newClientHandler)
      Replace the client associated to a username with a new one.
      Parameters:
      username - is the key of the client to be replaced
      newClientHandler - is the new client of the entry

    • getPlayers

      public static java.util.List<Player> getPlayers()
      Method getPlayers creates a new list of Players from the usernames of the connected clients.
      Returns:
      the list of players ready to play the Game.

    • getClientHandlerFromUsername

      public static ClientHandler getClientHandlerFromUsername​(java.lang.String username)
      Method getClientHandlerFromUsername
      Parameters:
      username - is a String that represents the key from which the Server gets the ClientHandler in the map.
      Returns:
      the ClientHandler linked to the username.

    • getUsernameFromClientHandler

      public static java.lang.String getUsernameFromClientHandler​(ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Method getUsernameFromClientHandler
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - is the ClientHandler that represents the value from which the Server gets the username in the map.
      Returns:
      the username linked to the ClientHandler.

    • removePlayer

      public static void removePlayer​(java.lang.String username)
      Method removePlayer closes the client connection and removes the player from the game.
      Parameters:
      username - is a String that represents the username of the Player to remove.

    • restorePlayer

      public static void restorePlayer​(java.lang.String username)
      Method restorePlayer restores a player from the disconnectionsBackup and adds the player to the current game.
      Parameters:
      username - is a String that represents the username of the Player to restore.

    • isGameStarted

      public static boolean isGameStarted()
      Is game started.
      Returns:
      true if game is started, false otherwise.
